Tunable.name: DEFAULT_LEAVE_NOW_MUST_RUN_SITUATION
Tunable.display: Default Leave Now Must Run Situation
Tunable.description: The situation type that drives the sim off the lot pronto.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_LEAVE_SITUATION
Tunable.description: The situation type for the background leave situation. It collects sims who are not in other situations and asks them to leave periodically.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_PLAYER_PLANNED_DRAMA_NODE
Tunable.description: The drama node that will be scheduled when a player plans an event for the future.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_TRAVEL_SITUATION
Tunable.description: The default situation for when you are simply traveling with a group of Sims.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_VISIT_SITUATION
Tunable.description: The default visit situation used when you ask someone to hang out or invite them in.

Tunable.name: EXTERNAL_AUTONOMY_DISCOURAGEMENT_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: If Allow External Autonomy is False, this multiplier is applied to autonomy. Lower values discourage external autonomy more. A value of 0 completely blocks external autonomy. A value of 1 doesn't apply discouragement, as if Allow External Autonomy was True.

TunableList.name: LEAVE_INTERACTION_TAGS
TunableList.description: The tags indicating leave lot interactions, but not leave lot must run interactions. These are used to determine if a leave lot interaction is running or cancel one if it is.

TunableList.name: MULTI_INSTANCE_SITUATION_DISPLAY_TYPES
TunableList.description: A set of situation display types which allow multiple running instances.

TunableEnum.description: A SituationDisplayType which allows multiple running instances.

TunableList.name: SITUATION_CATEGORY_PLAYER_PLANNED_DRAMA_NODE
TunableList.display: Situation Category Player Planned Drama Node
TunableList.description: A mapping of Situaiton Categories to Player Planned Drama Nodes used for scheduling. If the Situation Category is found in this mapping, the corresponding Drama Node is used. If the Situation Category is not found in this mapping, the tuned Default Player Planned Drama Node is used.

TunableTuple.description: The buff to apply to the Sim when we're trying to make them run the leave situation from a super speed three request.
